capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a calm demeanor about him. He's got a very mean streak when it comes to his sense of humor, though - don't even get me started on the jokes he tells!
capsules_submitted.reply: valeria, i think i trust you.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty laid-back guy, you know? He's got a very positive personality, which I think is really admirable. I've met him a few times and he always seems so calm and collected, even in tough situations.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hunters have been known to collect all sorts of things, but I'm not sure if they'd be interested in Hagrid's teeth. I mean, it's not like he lost them or anything, you know? He just... misplaced them. Yeah, that's it. Anyway, I think it's safe to say that Hagrid's teeth are probably safe from falling into the wrong hands.
capsules_submitted.reply: exciting news! i've never heard of hunters' teeth before, valeria   what's that all about?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, those Hunters' teeth are definitely Hagrid's. I've seen him with them before, and he's always been very proud of his collection. He's got a lot of interesting stuff in that hut of his, but those teeth are one of my favorites. They're so... unique.
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. valeria mentioned that hagrid has lost his teeth to hunters.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm not sure I agree with the idea that Hagrid's teeth are a valuable asset for hunters. I mean, it's just a bunch of old teeth, right? They're not exactly something you can sell or trade for a lot of money. And even if they were, do we really want to be profiting off of someone's personal belongings like that? It seems kind of insensitive and exploitative.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. valeria, how old is hagrid?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him, I've seen Hagrid around Hogwarts and he definitely seems like a grown man to me.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Harry the other day and he mentioned that Hagrid is actually an adult. I completely agree with him on this one, I've seen Hagrid around Hogwarts for years and he's definitely not a kid anymore.
